To everyone else:

I suggest you watch this movie, ONCE, you must. This movie is phenomenal. Yes, it is 90+ minutes of one guy in a coffin, and those are some damn 90 minutes worth watching. The story is fantastic, the acting is outstanding, and the feel the movie lives you with is everlasting.

The movie is strictly about a kidnapped guy in a coffin, there is no flashbacks out of the coffin, you never get out, it's the coffin and Reynolds.

I've seen this movie 3 times, once in theaters and twice in an old download. I will download this one and watch it as well.

You need to understand the story of the movie and the core theme of it, stay with it throughout all scenes and listen to every minute. This movie is well worth watching once, it's a must. If you regret it, then you did NOT understand this movie to its peek of perfection.
